title: The required segregating distance as prescribed under these Regulations shall be provided within such land intended to be used for residential or commercial purposes
clause_text: The required segregating distance as prescribed under these Regulations shall be provided within such land intended to be used for residential or commercial purposes.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone
